name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I excel in implementing high-performance solutions using **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Jenkins**, **Datadog**, and **Bitbucket**. My technical proficiency includes managing containers and orchestrating environments on **Linux** and **Windows**, streamlining continuous integration/delivery processes. Additionally, I bring expertise in **Python**, enhancing automation through scripts in **Bash** and **Perl**. I have a solid foundation working with **Git** for version control, along with a strong understanding of **TCP/IP** networking and **ITIL** practices. My prior experience as a Full Stack Developer has honed my ability to deliver secure and robust applications, utilizing frameworks like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and front-end technologies such as **React** and **Angular**.
